title: Ike Barinholtz | Trump Admits Coup, Says He’ll Pardon Jan. 6 Rioters if He Wins in 2024: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump making it clear he’s leading a pro-coup movement intent on dismantling American democracy.

Then, Ike Barinholtz pitches a COVID-based business idea before talking about working on a TV version of Mel Brook’s History of the World, Part I and his vacation to Hawaii.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
